title: Porcupine’s Plan feat. Jacob Laval
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Jacob Laval (John Mulaney & the Sack Lunch Bunch, Unbreakable Boy) plays a super savvy critter with a sharp body and even sharper mind in this Siberian folktale about taking advantage of hospitality.
